    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

            <entry>cahi1:data_cbbf3285b6eba44a32addfdd7bbc16ed0845cdb8</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sound waves travel through air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schallwellespielraum durch Luft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voyage de vagues saines par l'air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Curso das ondas sadias através do ar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corsa delle onde sonore attraverso aria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταξίδι υγιών κυμάτων μέσω του αέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Recorrido de las ondas acústicas a través del 
aire</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of three illustrations showing what happens during a concert on the Moon. The person outside the dome will not be able to pick up sound because there is no air that would act as a medium for sound to travel.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">moon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound medium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vacuum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vibrations</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst drei Abbildungen vom Darstellen, was 
während eines Konzerts auf dem Mond geschieht. Die Person 
außerhalb der Haube kann nicht, Ton aufzuheben, weil es keine Luft 
gibt, die als ein Medium dienen würde, damit Ton reist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de montrer de trois illustrations ce qui 
se produit pendant un concert sur la lune. La personne en dehors
du dôme ne pourra pas enregistrer le bruit parce qu'il n'y a aucun 
air qui agirait en tant que support pour que le bruit voyage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de mostrar de três ilustrações o
que acontece durante um concert na lua. A pessoa fora da 
abóbada não poderá  escolher acima o som porque não há nenhum ar 
que agiria como um media para que o som viaje.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di un mostrare delle tre 
illustrazioni che cosa accade durante il concerto sulla luna. La
persona fuori della cupola non potrà prendere il suono perché non ci
è aria che fungerebbe da media affinchè il suono viaggi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν τι συμβαίνει 
κατά τη διάρκεια μιας συναυλίας στο φεγγάρι. Το πρόσωπο 
έξω από το θόλο δεν θα είναι σε θέση να πάρει τον ήχο επειδή 
δεν υπάρχει κανένας αέρας που θα ενεργούσε ως μέσο για τον ήχο 
για να ταξιδεψει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de mostrar de tres ilustraciones qué 
sucede durante un concierto en la luna. La persona fuera de la 
bóveda no podrá tomar el sonido porque no hay aire que actuaría 
como media para que viaje el sonido.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mond</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stichhaltiger Medium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schallwellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vakuum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erschütterungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lune</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">support sain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vagues saines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">media sadio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ondas sadias</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vácuo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vibrações</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
